summary: An interview with UFC fighter Al Iaquinta where he discusses his upcoming fight against Kevin Lee, his opinions on Khabib Nurmagomedov and Conor McGregor, and other professional matters.

events_list.video_caption: The video begins with a red-tinted scene featuring a textured wall, transitioning to a black background with the text "OHMBET #IMMA SPORTSBOOK" in blue and white, followed by "BIGGEST MMA SPORTSBOOK IN THE WORLD" in white. The scene then shifts to a man in a dark suit and white shirt, standing in front of a promotional backdrop with a red and black design, featuring a close-up of a man's face. The man appears to be speaking, with slight changes in his facial expressions and head position throughout the video, suggesting he is engaged in a conversation or interview. The background remains consistent, emphasizing the promotional nature of the setting.
events_list.audio_caption: The audio clip begins with a question about starting camp for Kevin Lee. A male speaker responds, stating he doesn't have a start date but is always training, increasing the intensity, and is "in the thick of it right now." His tone suggests dedication and effort. He also mentions coming home sore and needing rest. In the background, there's a sound that resembles a door slam, although the exact nature remains uncertain.

events_list.video_caption: The video features a man dressed in a dark suit jacket and a white shirt, standing in front of a backdrop that includes a poster with a red and black color scheme. The man appears to be speaking, as his mouth moves and his facial expressions change throughout the video. The background poster includes a close-up image of a person's face, which is partially obscured by the man in the foreground. The setting suggests a formal event or press conference, with the man likely addressing an audience or participating in an interview. The lighting is bright, highlighting the man's features and the details of the poster behind him. The overall atmosphere is professional and focused on the man's presentation.
events_list.audio_caption: The audio clip begins with a man asking a question about putting "real estate on the back burner." Another man responds affirmatively, indicating he has an open house tomorrow. The first man is briefly heard laughing. The second man adds that "the house will sell tomorrow and that's it." Another voice interjects with "how many bedrooms?", followed by laughter. The speaker then says "legally?".

events_list.video_caption: The video features a man dressed in a dark suit and white shirt, standing in front of a promotional backdrop that includes a close-up image of another man's face. The backdrop is predominantly red and black, with the image of the man on the right side of the frame. The man in the suit appears to be engaged in a conversation or interview, as he is seen speaking and gesturing with his hands. His facial expressions and body language suggest that he is actively participating in the discussion. The setting appears to be a formal event or press conference, given the professional attire and the promotional backdrop. The lighting is bright, highlighting the man's features and the details of the backdrop. Throughout the video, the man maintains a composed demeanor, occasionally looking to his left and right, possibly addressing different individuals or responding to questions. The overall atmosphere is one of professionalism and focus, with the man in the suit being the central figure in the scene.
events_list.audio_caption: The audio clip features two male speakers engaging in a casual conversation. The first speaker is laughing while the other asks, "What are your appetite?" This is followed by someone requesting that the previous comment be edited out. The second speaker then asks a question about how Kevin's game has improved. The first speaker acknowledges Kevin is bigger, stronger and more mature as a fighter, although seemingly less mature as a person. The first speaker states that Kevin is polished and seasoned, having been in the ring with tough guys.

events_list.video_caption: The video features a man dressed in a dark suit jacket and a white shirt with a patterned collar, standing in front of a promotional backdrop. The backdrop includes a large image of a man's face, with a serious expression, wearing a red garment. The man in the foreground appears to be speaking, as his mouth moves and his head turns slightly from side to side, indicating he is engaged in a conversation or interview. The setting suggests a formal event, possibly related to sports or entertainment, given the promotional nature of the backdrop. The lighting is bright, highlighting the man's features and the details of the backdrop. Throughout the video, the man maintains a composed demeanor, with his facial expressions and body language suggesting he is focused on the conversation at hand.
events_list.audio_caption: The audio clip features a single male speaker with a conversational tone. He speaks about an opponent's perceived cockiness upon entering the UFC and how he humbled him, causing the opponent to change his life and move to Vegas. The speaker feels he has been in the opponent's head and acknowledges the opponent's hard work, moving to a new camp because he thinks it is a better team, so he knows the opponent is serious and coming to put it on him.

events_list.video_caption: The video features a man dressed in a dark suit and a white shirt with a patterned collar, standing in front of a promotional backdrop. The backdrop includes a large image of a man's face, with a serious expression, wearing a red garment. The setting suggests a formal event, possibly a press conference or promotional event, with the focus on the man and the promotional material behind him. events_list.audio_caption: The audio clip primarily features a male speaker discussing his relationships with his team, mentioning names like "Ray," "Matt," "Fobola," "Aljo," and "Wideman." He describes having a strong bond and feeling like they're a family, contrasting it with his opponent's possible lack of such support. He acknowledges that it won't win him the fight, but highlights the amount of work he's put in. The tone is conversational and thoughtful.

events_list.video_caption: The video features a man dressed in a dark suit jacket and a white shirt, standing in front of a promotional backdrop. The backdrop includes images of two individuals, one of whom is wearing a red garment. The man appears to be engaged in a conversation or interview, as he looks directly at the camera and occasionally glances to the side. His facial expressions change subtly throughout the video, indicating that he is actively speaking and responding to questions. The setting suggests a formal event or press conference, with the promotional backdrop adding context to the discussion. events_list.audio_caption: The clip features one male speaker discussing his upcoming fight and past grievances with a prior match. He expresses confidence and a strong desire to win, stating that he has to beat this guy, and contrasts his current preparation with the previous fight where injuries and timing were off. He describes his opponent as tough, possibly tougher than a previous adversary. He recalls watching his opponent's last fight, describing it as brutal and vowing to inflict similar punishment. The conversation seems to be taking place in a workout or training environment, as there is ambient background noise and faint sounds that imply some kind of ongoing activity.

events_list.video_caption: The video features a man dressed in a dark suit jacket and a white shirt with a patterned collar, standing in front of a promotional backdrop. The backdrop displays a close-up image of a man's face, with a serious expression, wearing a red garment. The man in the foreground appears to be engaged in a conversation or interview, as he turns his head slightly to the side, indicating he is listening or responding to someone off-camera. events_list.audio_caption: The audio clip features a male speaker, confident in tone, stating, "I think it's in my favor." He elaborates, mentioning cardio and the length of time being an advantage. He repeats, "I think it's in my favor."

events_list.video_caption: The video features a man dressed in a dark suit and white shirt, standing in front of a promotional backdrop that includes images of two fighters, one in red and the other in black. events_list.audio_caption: The audio clip features one male speaker, identified as Kevin, who has been "awfully quiet lately." There's a pause, followed by another male speaker discussing how he shoved it in Conor's face for talking about his "real estate," and how it made him feel good about himself.  The speaker seems confident and perhaps a little smug. Background ambiance includes indistinct sounds with varying volume.

events_list.video_caption: The video features a man dressed in a dark suit and a white shirt, standing in front of a promotional backdrop that includes images of two fighters, one with a white beard and the other with a bald head. events_list.audio_caption: The audio begins with a male speaker, referencing "Joe Rogan" and "John Kavanagh", indicating he "loved it" and thought it was "well deserved". He describes "putting on a freaking" performance and fighting "his ass off", suggesting an appreciation for their support. His tone is conversational and appreciative.

events_list.video_caption: The video features a man dressed in a dark suit jacket and a white shirt, standing in front of a promotional backdrop that includes images of two fighters, one with a white headband and the other with a red headband. The man appears to be engaged in a conversation or interview, as he looks to his left and right, occasionally glancing directly at the camera. His facial expressions change subtly, indicating he is speaking and reacting to the conversation. The background remains consistent throughout the video, with the promotional images providing a thematic context related to combat sports. The lighting is even, highlighting the man's features and the details of the backdrop. The overall atmosphere suggests a formal event, possibly a press conference or promotional event for a combat sports match.
events_list.audio_caption: The audio clip begins with a male speaker discussing an upcoming fight on Big Fox, expressing interest in the event's significance. His tone is conversational. He continues, noting the uniqueness of the event and casually agreeing with a previous statement. A second male voice then asks about Conor McGregor's tweets. The first speaker responds, recounting viewing the fight while under the influence. He recounts specific feelings related to the fight and fighter, citing “you fucking pussy.” He expresses his negative sentiment over the fighters actions stating, “if you talk all that and then you lose, you gotta allow him to you know finish you.” He concludes, expressing a personal hope to not behave in such a way. Another male asks if the fighter has a certain fighting instinct. The first speaker speculates about the fighter's changed mentality since gaining wealth, implying a lack of the drive he once had.

events_list.audio_caption: The audio begins with two speakers, both male, discussing a sports figure and controversy around the statement "it's only business in the corner," regarding its potential meaning, with one speaker expressing uncertainty about whether the statement was even made. One speaker then presents a possible interpretation that the athlete was tired in the third round, and was trying to ease up without explicitly saying so. The speaker pivots to apologize for potentially making light of a serious issue, recognizing that their companion is taking the matter seriously. They conclude by suggesting that the athlete's statement might be a way to mitigate the severity of the situation.

events_list.video_caption: The video features a man dressed in a dark suit and white shirt, standing in front of a promotional backdrop that includes images of two fighters, one with a red robe and the other with a white robe. The man appears to be at a press event or promotional event, possibly related to a boxing match or similar combat sport. He is seen looking to his left, then turning his head to face the camera, and then back to his left, suggesting he is engaged in a conversation or interview. The background remains consistent throughout the video, with the promotional images of the fighters providing a thematic context to the event. The man's facial expressions and body language indicate he is actively participating in the event, likely addressing questions or discussing the upcoming match. The lighting is bright, highlighting the man and the promotional backdrop, creating a professional and focused atmosphere.
events_list.audio_caption: The audio begins with a male voice expressing surprise and excitement, saying, "How'd you feel seeing Khabib fly out of the octagon like that?" and describing the situation as "crazy." There's a brief laugh, followed by another male speaker who seems to be more composed, stating "we were all sitting there just like what is going on right now, this is insane." He then adds, "Good for him." Further laughter occurs before a third speaker poses a question about the bus incident, asking if it makes the situation feel even now. The second speaker then replies stating, "I don't want to be."

events_list.video_caption: The video features a man dressed in a dark suit and a white shirt, standing in front of a backdrop that includes a large image of another man's face. The man in the suit appears to be speaking, as his mouth moves and his head turns slightly from side to side. The backdrop behind him is predominantly red and black, with the image of the other man's face being the most prominent feature. The man in the suit has short, neatly styled hair and a clean-shaven face. The setting appears to be a formal event or press conference, given the professional attire and the presence of the backdrop. The lighting is bright, highlighting the man's face and the details of his suit. The video captures the man's expressions and movements as he speaks, providing a sense of engagement and focus on the subject matter at hand.
events_list.audio_caption: The audio clip features one male speaker discussing a past incident, describing it as "a little more criminal" and lamenting that "innocent girls on the bus" and "UFC employees" were targeted. He recounts being on the bus during the event, expressing the belief that they were all going to die and highlighting the frightening experience of things flying through the window. He then mentions someone named Reed Harris, asking "what's going on?". The speaker's tone suggests a mix of seriousness and recollection.

events_list.video_caption: The video features a man dressed in a dark suit jacket and a white shirt with a patterned collar, standing in front of a backdrop that includes a large image of another man's face. The man in the suit appears to be engaged in a conversation or interview, as he looks around and gestures with his hands. events_list.audio_caption: The audio clip begins with a male speaker humorously recounting a story about another person's reaction during turbulence, mentioning a "airplane position." There is some indistinct background chatter. The speaker shifts to discuss the aftermath of a different event, noting Dana White's reaction and the general "hang-wringing." Another person, seemingly male, asks about enjoying the event and whether there was a desire for "revenge," referring to an earlier event where someone "got to get his hands on Connor in the cage." The first speaker responds that he doesn't want to get into that, that at the time he thought it was funny, and he is not a "revenge person." A third person, seemingly male, asks if there's any chance that if he were to "beat Kevin," he would fight "Connor."

events_list.video_caption: The video features a man dressed in a dark suit jacket and a white shirt with a patterned collar, standing in front of a promotional backdrop. The backdrop includes a large image of a man's face, with a serious expression, wearing a red garment. The man in the foreground appears to be speaking, as his mouth is open in some frames, and his head is turned slightly to the side, indicating he is engaged in conversation. The setting suggests a formal event, possibly a press conference or promotional event, given the professional attire and the promotional backdrop. The lighting is bright, highlighting the man's features and the backdrop behind him. The atmosphere is serious and focused, with the man's expressions and posture conveying a sense of professionalism and engagement.
events_list.audio_caption: The clip begins with a male speaker stating "Absolutely. Yeah. I just I gotta win that fight for sure," and expressing his positive outlook for the upcoming fight. Transitioning slightly, he shares his thoughts on his opponent, and that he had wished to fight a different opponent, but that he feels good about this particular fight because his fighter "looks the best he's looked". Concluding, he says "Thanks guys", before the clip ends.
